question: Which of the following Viceroys of India used to write poems with the Pen name of “Owen Meredith”?
explanation: Lord Lytton served as the Viceroy of India between 1876 and 1880. He was responsible for introducing Vernacular Press Act in 1878. At the age of 25 years, he published a volume of poems under the name of Owen Meredith in London.
